member.name: T:TheBoxSoftware.Diagnostics.TraceHelper
member.summary: Centralised Trace class that managed all Tracing information generated by the application.
member.remarks:
All trace information generated by implementing applications should travel through the .
That is so it can manage wether or not the trace information is output to the trace listeners. All method calls internally check the property.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.Diagnostics.TraceHelper.IsTraceEnabled
member.summary: Indicates if Traceing has been switched on for this application.

member.name: T:TheBoxSoftware.IExtendedException
member.summary: Interface to extend exceptions to provide more details than the basic message.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.IExtendedException.GetExtendedInformation
member.summary: When implemented by a base type should return formatted text which attempts to utilise the internal information to return more helpful information than is noramlly provided via message.

member.name: T:TheBoxSoftware.Licencing.Licence
member.summary: Represents the details of a License which determines what functionliaty (if any) is available at run time.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.Licencing.Licence.Validate(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Performs a validation test on the license to check if the provided components, versions and time makes this a valid or invalid license for those criteria.
member.param: The string representing the component to check.
The version to check the component for.
member.returns: A ValidationInfo file that describes the results of the validation test.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.Licencing.Licence.Encrypt
member.summary: Encrypts the current instance to a byte array.
member.returns: A byte array of encrypted data.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.Licencing.Licence.Decrypt(System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts the specified file to an instance of License.
member.returns: A license containing licensing information or null if license was not found or is invalid.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.Licencing.Licence.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the display name of the account holder.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.Licencing.Licence.Email
member.summary: Gest or sets the account id for the account holder.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.Licencing.Licence.Components
member.summary: Gets or sets the components that are licensed.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.Licencing.Licence.End
member.summary: Gets or sets a date that indicates when the license will expire - can be null.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.Licencing.Licence.Start
member.summary: Gets or sets the start date for the license.

member.name: T:TheBoxSoftware.Licencing.Licence.ValidationInfo
member.summary: Provides information on the validatity of a license based on a test.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.Licencing.Licence.ValidationInfo.IsVersionInvalid
member.summary: Indicates if the version is licensed.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.Licencing.Licence.ValidationInfo.IsComponentValid
member.summary: Indicates if the component is licensed.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.Licencing.Licence.ValidationInfo.HasExpired
member.summary: Indicates if the license has expired.
